description: Detects suspicious ways to use the "DumpMinitool.exe" binary
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
name: Suspicious DumpMinitool Execution
query: (((process.executable.text:("*\\DumpMinitool.exe" OR "*\\DumpMinitool.x86.exe" OR "*\\DumpMinitool.arm64.exe")) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("DumpMinitool.exe" OR "DumpMinitool.x86.exe" OR "DumpMinitool.arm64.exe"))) AND (((((NOT process.executable.text:("*\\Microsoft\ Visual\ Studio\\*" OR "*\\Extensions\\*"))) OR (process.command_line.text:"*.txt*"))) OR ((process.command_line.text:("*\ Full*" OR "*\ Mini*" OR "*\ WithHeap*") AND (NOT process.command_line.text:"*\-\-dumpType*")))))
